Author: p3rk3
Name: LeanMidiBard
Description:
使用MIDI文件或MIDI键盘进行诗人演奏。
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
- Basic cloud integration
Punchline: A fork of akira0245's MidiBard. Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
